name: The Final Encounter (FonkinS)
description:
After years of travel through the deep depths of hell, you have finally made it to the deepest level, the layer of Asmodeus, lord of the nine. But, its a bit hot down there. Take care when battling the lord of the nine to not overheat, and pay attention to your heat bar.

Please note that although an embedded web version of the game is provided, I do NOT recommend its use, do to it's low sound and visual quality

Made for the 3rd Vimjam in 10 days.

How to play:

In this game, you must defeat Asmodeus in his 3 phases. You have 3 actions to flip through: Move, Shoot, and Spin (a melee attack) but you can only have one active at a time. Each action will cause you to heat up, as will getting hit by an enemy. If you reach maximum heat, you will overheat and have to start over.

A/D/arrow-keys - switch between actions
Mouse - aim
Left Mouse Click - use current action

How does this submission fit the theme & focus?
Only one action can be used at a time, and they are all used using the same input (left mouse button). Instead of having health, you have a bar indicating how hot you are. If you overheat (from activities such as using your actions or getting hit by an enemy) you will lose and have to start over

All assets and programming by Fonkin S.

Tools used:
Godot Game Engine
Aseprite
SFXR.me
BeepBox.co
Audacity
